subtitle: Thinking Allowed Conversations on the leading edge of knowledge

Hello and welcome.

The two of us are here together to keep things interesting for you.
Our topic today is how you can get the most out
of the new Thinking Allowed YouTube channel.
And to begin with, I have to mention our searchable database.
You can find it right at the very top of the
new Thinking Allowed Foundation website, which
is newthinkingallowed.org.
And the interesting thing here is you can type in any search term or combination of
words and it'll go through our entire video catalog, well over a thousand videos.
But wait, that's not all, because we've included
in our searchable database the videos from
a number of other related organizations, the
Institute of Noetic Sciences and on and on.
So, there are many, many other videos.

So, it's a great resource and a great research
tool that we want to make available to the
community of interested viewers.
There are many other features in the New Thinking Allowed channel.
One of them, which you may not be aware of, are the audio podcasts.
For those of you who really don't have the time to sit in front of a TV screen but do
have the time to play audio tapes while you're
driving, while you're exercising, those tapes
are available through Apple Podcasts and many other resources.
You can find the complete list of available audio tapes, which includes well over 500
titles as far as I can tell, on the nonlocalmind.org website.
Another feature you may not be aware of, and
it's a relatively recent feature, are the
edited foreign language translations of our transcripts.
You can view these as subtitles or captions while you're watching the videos.
The edited languages on all of our newer videos
include French, Russian, German, Portuguese,
Italian, and Spanish.
So, for those of you who have friends in other
countries or who would prefer to understand

to make available to you.

having psychic experiences of a wide variety
and want to have a support group, a community
